zapWhat.title: What are Zaps?
zapWhat.description: Zaps are a tipping method using Bitcoin. Creators can easily receive Bitcoin, and users can support them at a low cost.

whyZap.title: Why Zap?
whyZap.description1: Traditional remittance systems have high fees and take a long time to process transactions. Especially for international transfers, costs and time increase, making them inconvenient.
whyZap.description2: The Lightning Network for Bitcoin enables almost instantaneous transactions with low fees. This allows for easy exchange of value.
whyZap.description3: Moreover, Zap utilizing the Lightning Network and Nostr allows creators and users to support each other directly without intermediaries. This mechanism enables free interaction without relying on traditional platforms.

anonymousZap.title: Anonymous Zap
anonymousZap.description: This method allows sending without revealing the sender. It can be used without a Nostr account as long as you have a Lightning wallet.

identifiedZap.title: Identified Zap
identifiedZap.description: This method involves revealing the sender. It requires a Lightning wallet, a Nostr account, and a Nostr Extension.

step1.title: 1. Create a Lightning Wallet
step1.description: "Wallet of Satoshi (WoS)" is a simple wallet app compatible with Zaps. Please download it from the official website.
step1.description2: Once you add sats to your wallet, you can perform Anonymous Zap. Try it by pressing the Zap button on the site. If you want to use Identified Zap, proceed to the next step.

step2.title: 2. Create a Nostr Account
step2.description: Create a Nostr account by visiting nostter.app. Set up your profile after creating the account.

step3.title: 3. Install Nostr Extension (Nostr Login Extension)
step3.description: Install a browser extension for Nostr. The installation method differs for PC, iOS, and Android. Please refer to this tutorial(Japanese) for detailed steps. Use the private key created in nostter. Copy it from the "Settings" page of nostter.

step4.title: 4. Perform Zap
step4.description: When you press the Zap button, a notification window from the Nostr Extension will appear. Please allow it. Next, a QR code for payment will be displayed. Sending sats from WoS will complete the Zap. Check the Zap list to confirm your Zap has been recorded.

bitcoin.title: Bitcoin
bitcoin.description: Bitcoin is a digital currency that does not require a central authority. It is also used as a store of value.

lightningNetwork.title: Lightning Network
lightningNetwork.description: The Lightning Network is a technology that speeds up Bitcoin transactions and reduces fees. This makes small payments easier and maintains anonymity.

zap.title: Zap (Nostr Lightning Zaps)
zap.description: Zap is a feature on Nostr that uses the Lightning Network to send Bitcoin. By linking it to a Nostr account, you can publicly display the sender, recipient, amount, and comments without a third party. This makes supporting creators easy.

nostr.title: Nostr
nostr.description: Nostr is a decentralized social network protocol without central servers. Users manage their identities with public and private keys and post messages. This protocol is resistant to censorship and provides a free-to-join network. It is also simple and highly extensible, allowing developers to easily create their own clients and services.

note.title: Note
note.list1: After installing Wallet of Satoshi (WoS), register your email address from the menu. If you do not register, you will not be able to access your wallet's Bitcoin if your device fails.
note.list2: Do not share your Nostr private key with others. Your account may be compromised. If that happens, create a new private key and change your account.
